川.definition: (bound form) river; creek; plain; an area of level country

川匯.definition: Chuanhui district of Zhoukou city 周口市[Zhou1 kou3 shi4], Henan

川匯區.definition: Chuanhui district of Zhoukou city 周口市[Zhou1 kou3 shi4], Henan

川外.definition: abbr. for 四川外國語大學|四川外国语大学[Si4 chuan1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]

川建國.definition: nickname for US President Trump 川普[Chuan1 pu3], implying that he benefitted China (hence 建國|建国[jian4 guo2]) by doing a poor job of leading the US

川普.definition: Sichuanese pidgin (the mix of Standard Mandarin and Sichuanese dialect); (Tw) surname Trump

川木香.definition: root of Vladimiria souliei (used in TCM); Dolomiaea souliei

川沙.definition: Chuansha, name of street and park in Pudong New District 浦東新區|浦东新区[Pu3 dong1 xin1 qu1], Shanghai

川流不息.definition: the stream flows without stopping (idiom); unending flow

川端康成.definition: Kawabata Yasunari, Japanese literature Nobel laureate

川芎.definition: chuanxiong rhizome (rhizome of Ligusticum wallichii, used in TCM)

川褐頭山雀.definition: (bird species of China) Sichuan tit (Poecile weigoldicus)

川貝.definition: Sichuan fritillary bulb (Bulbus fritillariae cirrhosae, used in TCM)

川震.definition: Sichuan great earthquake, the magnitude 8 earthquake of May 2008 at Wenchuan 汶川, Sichuan, that killed more than 80,000 people; same as 四川大地震[Si4 chuan1 Da4 di4 zhen4]

川魯粵蘇浙閩湘徽.pinyin: chuān lǔ yuè sū zhè mǐn xiāng huī
川魯粵蘇浙閩湘徽.definition: the cuisines of Sichuan, Shandong, Guangdong, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian, Hunan and Anhui (the eight major cuisines of China 八大菜系[ba1 da4 cai4 xi4])

川黨.definition: Sichuan codonopsis (Codonopsis pilosula, root used in TCM)

川黨參.definition: Sichuan codonopsis (Codonopsis pilosula, root used in TCM)
